page.title: 15Mum's Diary (Continued)
page.content: 12.45pm. Started to prepare lunch. (I am starving!) 1.20pm. Lunch. Roast chicken followed by ice cream. After lunch I tidied up and popped around to Amy's Grandma's house two doors away where Amy's Great Granny had come to lunch. She is 85 years old, and we have to shout to make her hear us. 3.00pm. We have decided to go to Berkeley Castle as the weather is not too good. One minute it is sunny and the next it is raining. First stop the garage for some sweets for the journey.I wasn't allowed any,(I'm trying to lose weight.) Then on to the castle. 3.30pm.We had a guided tour around the castle. It is very interesting and then we looked around the grounds. As we left the castle it started to rain.
